synopsis.text: Atsushi Kamiya, a celebrated figure in the world of soccer, returns to his alma mater, Kakegawa High School, after a successful stint as the captain of a prestigious Italian soccer team. To his dismay, he finds the once formidable soccer team of his high school languishing in mediocrity. But destiny has a twist in store for him in the form of Hideto Tsuji, a seemingly indifferent high school student. As their paths intersect, a new chapter unfolds, promising to restore the lost glory of the soccer club and ignite a spark of greatness.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
